an7.78:4.1: * “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti.
an7.78:4.3: Āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—
an7.78:4.5: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
an7.78:4.6: Dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena yathākammūpage satte pajānāti.
an7.78:4.7: Āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an7.78:4.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hotī”ti.
